episode_summary: This episode, recorded live at the Nerdland Festival in Belgium, features discussions on AI's capabilities, crocodile hairballs, historical misconceptions about English people, and the rigorous training required for toilet paper testers. The hosts explore various quirky facts, including AI's chess prowess, crocodiles' inability to digest hair, and the origins of the rumor that Englishmen had tails.

facts.fact: In 2017, the AI computer AlphaZero was given the rules of chess, and four hours later, it was better than the human world champion in chess.
In the 14th century, there was a rumour among Europeans that all Englishmen had tails.
Toilet paper testers have to train for six months before they are allowed to apply for the actual job.
